heading: Vocalises.
general-note: Here are entered compositions for solo voice(s) without text. Instrumental compositions in song style are entered under. Songs without words (Instrumental music)..

This heading may be qualified by number of voices or by voice range, with accompaniment added as appropriate, e.g.. Vocalises (Voices (2)) with piano; Vocalises (High voice) with chamber orchestra; Vocalises (Vocal ensemble), Unaccompanied..
